attributes.action: Allow all football matches at grassroots level to take the knee before the game
attributes.additional_details: To raise awareness about this topic as it affects people of different ethnic minorities mentally and physically as equality should be vital in our community. Especially at grassroots level football where we want all players to take the knee for Black Lives Matter.
attributes.background: Become stricter on discrimination in society and allow punishments to be put in place.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the footballing authorities.
